participant_1.background:
I like to go to the park with my siblings and pretend we are dragon trainers.
I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.
I want to learn how to express my emotions more effectively in romantic relationships.
i want to teach kids in elementary school.
i work on wall street.

participant_2.background:
I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
i volunteer at animal shelters.
i like antiques.
I have been single for a while now and enjoy spending my time fishing and relaxing.

content.text: What's up?
Not much! What about you?
I'm doing well. I'm a bit bored at work, so I'm on Reddit. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to volunteer at animal shelters and go fishing. What about you?
I like to go to the park with my siblings and pretend we're dragon trainers. I also love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.
That's cool! I've never been snorkeling before. I've spent many hours watching my lizard Gila basking in the sun.
I love reptiles! I've always wanted a pet snake.
I've never had a pet snake, but I've always thought they were cool.
Yeah, they're great pets. They're low maintenance and they're really interesting to watch.
I'm more of a cat person, but I can appreciate a good snake.
I like cats too! They're so cute and cuddly.
I agree! They're the best pets.
What do you like about your job?
I like the people I work with and the fact that I get to do some creative work. I also like the flexibility of my schedule.
That's great! I like my job too, but I'm not sure how long I want to stay on Wall Street. I'm thinking about becoming a teacher.
That's awesome! I've always thought teaching would be a great job.
Me too! I think it would be really rewarding to help kids learn.
I'm sure you'd be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm going to start working on my teaching credentials soon.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I'm excited to start this new chapter in my life.
I'm sure it will be a lot of fun
